channel.title: University of Arizona Department of Pediatrics Residency Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
channel.itunes:subtitle: Pediatric topics relevant to the Continuity Clinic experience.
channel.description: In order to respond to the recent challenges of modern pediatric resident education, The University of Arizona Department of Pediatrics has begun a pediatric 'pedcast' curriculum. The initial focus of this curriculum will be on general pediatric topics relevant to the Continuity Clinic experience. As this technology evolves we anticipate including subspecialty topics as well. Disclaimer: The University of Arizona Department of Pediatrics pedcasts are intended for educational purposes only. The information contained within is in no way intended to serve as, nor provide a substitute for, medical consultation, advice, treatment or service. Listeners should confirm any information contained in the pedcasts prior to applying it to their patient care or consultation. The State of Arizona, the Arizona Board of Regents and the University of Arizona College of Medicine, Department of Pediatrics, shall not assume responsibility for any direct, indirect, consequential, special, exemplary, or other damages arising there from.
channel.itunes:keywords: residency education medical pediatrics arizona university

item.title: Interviewing Adolescents
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Richard Wahl and Dr. Ball discuss techniques used to interview adolescent patients.

item.title: Journal Club Screening Tests
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball talks about the efficacy of Journal Club Screening Tests.

item.title: Detection and Management of Domestic Violence in the Pediatric Practice
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball talks with pediatric social worker Doris Sisk about detecting and managing domestic violence.

item.title: Breastfeeding Counseling and Clinical Practice
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball and Dr. Carol Swanson talk about common breastfeeding issues encountered during the first two to three weeks of life in healthly, full-term infants.

item.title: Devices for use in the Central Nervous System of Children with Special Health Care Needs
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball and Dr. Rodrigo Villar discuss devices for use in the central nervous system of children with special health care needs.

item.title: Devices for use in Children with Special Health Care Needs
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball and Dr. Rodrigo Villar discuss devices for use in children with special health care needs.

item.title: Pet-Borne Infectious Illness
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball and Dr. Leslie Barton, MD, discuss pet-borne infectious illnesses.

item.title: Herbs for Use in Pediatrics
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball and Dr. Sandy Newmark, MD, FAAP discuss herbs for use in pediatrics.

item.title: Injury Prevention
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball and Dr. Bill Marshall discuss injury prevention.

item.title: Failure to Thrive (Part I): Diagnosis and Initial Management
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball and Dr. Anna Binkiewicz discuss diagnosis and initial management of patients with Failure to Thrive in this two part Pedcast.

item.title: Failure to Thrive (Part II): Nutritional Management
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball and Dr. Anna Binkiewicz discuss nutritional management of patients with Failure to Thrive in this two part Pedcast.

item.title: Separation Anxiety and School Refusal
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball and Dr. Sydney Rice talk about separation anxiety and school refusal.

item.title: Respiratory Syncytial Virus
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball talks with Dr. Mark Brown about the clinical and laboratory diagnosis and treatment of RSV infections.

item.title: Influenza
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball talks with Dr. Sean Elliott about influenza.

item.title: An Introduction to Medical Interviewing
item.itunes:author: Dr. Tom Ball, MD, MPH
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Ball talks with social worker Doris Sisk on setting the stage, guiding, and concluding a medical interview.
